brand.name: Purity Lace Designs
brand.ethicalInfo1: Purity Lace Designs does not communicate sufficient information about its environmental and labour policies.
brand.ethicalInfo2:
This brand provides insufficient relevant information about how it reduces its impact on people, the planet and animals. You have a right to know how the products you buy affect the issues you care about.

Purity Lace Designs is rated 'Not good enough' overall.
brand.positiveText: Dear Purity Lace Designs, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear Purity Lace Designs, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.
